text: The golden child may be the oldest one, unless it's the youngest. It may be the toughest one, unless it's the most sensitive. It's not even necessary that Mom and Dad have the same favorite - and typically they don't.
author: Jeffrey Kluger

text: In Hollywood, you play a mom, and the next thing you know, you're on 'The Golden Girls.' They age you so fast.
author: Gabrielle Union

text: In Hollywood, you play a mom and instantly, you've got osteoporosis.
author: Gabrielle Union

text: My mom is painfully sweet she's from Nebraska.
author: Gabrielle Union

text: My mom was a diabetic. Her sister was a diabetic, so I was already a candidate.
author: Angie Stone
